body: @Berkel This is not netori u moron. For it to be netori the delinquent guy should be the one doing the ntr.
nahh,i didn't get the ntr vibe in this one. i mean fuetakishi's another artwork touchuukasou just giving this ntr vibe more
Really need to remove the cheating ntr and rape tagg because none of it is true in this serie.
Now we wait for the translations
This is not a bad NTR like the other work that the author did
The older guy obviously feels like he's being cucked.  He's literally masturbating in the fetal position on the last page lol

I feel like part one antagonizing the main guy (bully) was a bad move, as it took away the "NTR" vibe and turned into some sort of revenge bully. Now readers would mostly feel just desserts for the main guy cause he made the mistake first. Moreover, his feelings for the girl wasn't really developed upon enough for the readers to sympathize with him. The NTR effect is almost gone with this.
@soma_yoma lol NTR just not to be what you say. Ntr means that what you want or have has been stolen from other people(sleep with fcking bastard). So i guess this is not cheating but netorare

Should this really be NTR or cheating? In part one she never showed any feeling towards that blonde dude and kind of fell for the bullied kid that was punished to confess to her. I mean, she was not stolen from him nor they ever had a relationship to begin with, so imo I don't see it that way. What do you guys think?
